event.description: Tyson Gillies grounds out to first baseman Mark Teixeira.
Scott Podsednik singles on a line drive to left fielder Andruw Jones.
Ty Wigginton flies out to right fielder Chris Dickerson.
With Hunter Pence batting, Scott Podsednik steals (1) 2nd base.
Hunter Pence homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Scott Podsednik scores.
Domonic Brown triples (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Andruw Jones, deflected by center fielder Dewayne Wise.
John Mayberry flies out to left fielder Andruw Jones.
Michael Martinez strikes out swinging.
Freddy Galvis strikes out swinging.
Tuffy Gosewisch singles on a ground ball to third baseman Alex Rodriguez.
Tyson Gillies grounds out to first baseman Mark Teixeira.
Pitcher Change: D. J. Mitchell replaces Freddy Garcia.
Scott Podsednik grounds out, second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Mark Teixeira.
Ty Wigginton pops out to catcher Francisco Cervelli in foul territory.
Hunter Pence grounds out, shortstop Derek Jeter to first baseman Mark Teixeira.
Domonic Brown singles on a line drive to right fielder Chris Dickerson.
With John Mayberry batting, Domonic Brown caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Francisco Cervelli to second baseman Robinson Cano.
John Mayberry doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Andruw Jones.
Michael Martinez walks.
Freddy Galvis grounds out, first baseman Mark Teixeira to pitcher D. J. Mitchell. John Mayberry to 3rd. Michael Martinez to 2nd.
Tuffy Gosewisch flies out to right fielder Chris Dickerson.
Pitcher Change: Boone Logan replaces D. J. Mitchell.
Tyson Gillies singles on a ground ball to right fielder Chris Dickerson.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Laynce Nix replaces Scott Podsednik.
Laynce Nix strikes out swinging.
Ty Wigginton pops out to third baseman Alex Rodriguez.
Hunter Pence strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Doug Bernier replaces shortstop Derek Jeter, batting 1st, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: David Adams replaces second baseman Robinson Cano, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Corban Joseph replaces third baseman Alex Rodriguez, batting 3rd, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Jose Gil replaces first baseman Mark Teixeira, batting 4th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Colin Curtis replaces left fielder Andruw Jones, batting 5th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Zoilo Almonte replaces right fielder Chris Dickerson, batting 7th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Melky Mesa replaces center fielder Dewayne Wise, batting 8th, playing center field.
Pitcher Change: Cory Wade replaces Boone Logan.
Domonic Brown pops out to catcher Francisco Cervelli in foul territory.
John Mayberry grounds out, shortstop Doug Bernier to first baseman Jose Gil.
Michael Martinez doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Colin Curtis.
Freddy Galvis doubles (1) on a ground ball to right fielder Zoilo Almonte. Michael Martinez scores.
Tuffy Gosewisch strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: JR Murphy replaces catcher Francisco Cervelli, batting 6th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Clay Rapada replaces Cory Wade.
Juan Pierre bunt grounds out, third baseman Corban Joseph to first baseman Jose Gil.
Laynce Nix strikes out swinging.
Pete Orr strikes out swinging.
Jayson Nix remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Kevin Whelan replaces Clay Rapada.
Lou Montanez hits a ground-rule double (1) on a fly ball to right field.
Domonic Brown grounds out, first baseman Jose Gil to pitcher Kevin Whelan. Lou Montanez to 3rd.
Hector Luna grounds out, second baseman David Adams to first baseman Jose Gil. Lou Montanez scores.
Kevin Frandsen strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Chase Whitley replaces Kevin Whelan.
Freddy Galvis singles on a ground ball to second baseman David Adams, deflected by pitcher Chase Whitley.
Steven Lerud flies into a force out, left fielder Colin Curtis to second baseman David Adams. Freddy Galvis out at 2nd. Steven Lerud to 1st.
Juan Pierre singles on a ground ball to left fielder Colin Curtis. Steven Lerud to 2nd.
Laynce Nix grounds out, second baseman David Adams to first baseman Jose Gil. Steven Lerud to 3rd. Juan Pierre to 2nd.
Pete Orr strikes out swinging.
Derek Jeter grounds out, shortstop Freddy Galvis to first baseman John Mayberry.
Robinson Cano strikes out swinging.
Alex Rodriguez homers (1) on a fly ball to right field.
Mark Teixeira grounds out, first baseman John Mayberry to pitcher Roy Halladay.
Andruw Jones singles on a line drive to left fielder Domonic Brown.
Francisco Cervelli reaches on force attempt, fielding error by second baseman Michael Martinez. Andruw Jones to 2nd.
Chris Dickerson called out on strikes.
Dewayne Wise pops out to shortstop Freddy Galvis on the infield fly rule.
Justin Maxwell called out on strikes.
Pitcher Change: Joel Pineiro replaces Roy Halladay.
Derek Jeter grounds out, shortstop Freddy Galvis to first baseman John Mayberry.
Robinson Cano singles on a ground ball to left fielder Domonic Brown.
Alex Rodriguez singles on a ground ball to left fielder Domonic Brown. Robinson Cano to 2nd.
Mark Teixeira pops into a force out, shortstop Freddy Galvis to third baseman Ty Wigginton. Robinson Cano out at 3rd. Alex Rodriguez to 2nd. Mark Teixeira to 1st.
Andruw Jones hit by pitch. Alex Rodriguez to 3rd. Mark Teixeira to 2nd.
Francisco Cervelli walks. Alex Rodriguez scores. Mark Teixeira to 3rd. Andruw Jones to 2nd.
Chris Dickerson grounds out to first baseman John Mayberry.
Dewayne Wise grounds out, second baseman Michael Martinez to first baseman John Mayberry.
Justin Maxwell reaches on fielding error by third baseman Ty Wigginton.
Derek Jeter grounds out, second baseman Michael Martinez to first baseman John Mayberry. Justin Maxwell to 2nd.
Robinson Cano reaches on fielding error by second baseman Michael Martinez. Justin Maxwell scores.
Alex Rodriguez doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Domonic Brown. Robinson Cano scores.
Mark Teixeira grounds out, second baseman Michael Martinez to first baseman John Mayberry.
Defensive Substitution: Juan Pierre replaces center fielder Tyson Gillies, batting 1st, playing center field.
Laynce Nix remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Defensive Substitution: Pete Orr replaces third baseman Ty Wigginton, batting 3rd, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Lou Montanez replaces right fielder Hunter Pence, batting 4th, playing right field.
Pitcher Change: David Purcey replaces Joel Pineiro.
Andruw Jones flies out to right fielder Lou Montanez.
Francisco Cervelli grounds out, shortstop Freddy Galvis to first baseman John Mayberry.
Chris Dickerson walks.
With Dewayne Wise batting, Chris Dickerson steals (1) 2nd base.
Dewayne Wise grounds out, shortstop Freddy Galvis to first baseman John Mayberry.

Colin Curtis strikes out swinging.
